text: @realDonaldTrump You’re a day late & a dollar short, dipshit, as usual. You’re as responsible for #GeorgeFloyds murder as you are for the #100ThousandDead from #Covid19.  Your inaction with #coronavirus and your fomenting of racism: this is on YOU, 100%! #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath , including this one.
